name: Record & Play
description:
Please use the Oculus apk if you are able to. PCVR version has NOT BEEN TESTED.

In this game you will have to record yourself completing half of a puzzle. Then, play back the recording to help you solve the second half of the puzzle. You only get one chance to record yourself. Otherwise you have to restart the level.

This game was made for VR Game Jam 2022. This is my second game jam and my first for VR. I had planned to finish 8 levels but was only able to finish 6 for now. I have some clever plans for the future. I do expect to add more levels at a later date.

Controls

  • Left joystick - walk
  • Right joystick - rotate
  • Grip - grab items

Please let me know if you find any bugs.
